entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Matapedia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:01 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Matapedia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 70 gusting to 90 early this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 70 km/h gusting to 90 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
